title: Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 455 of 2011)), with the consent of the Minister
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Horse and Greyhound Racing
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Horse and Greyhound Racing 

Fund Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited horse greyhound racing fund regulation 2021

title: Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 455 of 2011)), with the consent of the Minister
heading: 2. The amount of €1,549,991,713 is specified for the purposes of section
text_raw:
2. The amount of €1,549,991,713 is specified for the purposes of section 

12(5) of the Horse and Greyhound Racing Act 2001. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Finance consents to the foregoing Regulations. 

[739] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the foregoing 
Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [739]
